items.question: How long is the free trial period?
items.answer: You can use all features without limitations for 14 days.

items.question: Is my data stored securely?
items.answer: Yes, all data is encrypted and stored securely.

items.question: Can I use it on mobile?
items.answer: Yes, it's available on both web browsers and mobile apps.
